entries.bad_target: You must have a valid player target to Propose Unity.
entries.bad_facing: You must be facing your target to properly propose!
entries.out_of_range: Your target is too far away to properly propose!
entries.prose_already_proposed: But you already have an outstanding unity proposal to %TO.
entries.prose_already_married: You cannot propose unity. You are already united with %TO.
entries.target_not_player: You may only propose unity to another player.
entries.target_married: You cannot propose unity to someone who is already united.
entries.target_proposed: Your proposal target is already engaged in a unity proposal.
entries.no_ring: You cannot accept a unity proposal without a ring.
entries.accept_fail: Your proposal target has no ring.
entries.prose_accept_fail: %TO has no ring and therefore cannot accept.
entries.declined: Your unity proposal has been declined.
entries.prose_declined: Your unity proposal to %TO has been declined.
entries.expire_player: The unity proposal you extended has expired.
entries.expire_target: The unity proposal extended to you has expired.
entries.prose_expire_player: The unity proposal you extended to %TO has expired.
entries.prose_expire_target: The unity proposal extended to you by %TO has expired.
entries.wed_error: An error has occurred during the unity process.
entries.wed_oor: You must remain within 15 meters during the unity process for it to complete.
entries.ring_prompt: Select the ring you would like to use for  your unity.
entries.sui_propose_prompt: %TT is proposing unity to you. Do you wish to accept?
entries.already_proposing: You are already in the process of proposing to %TT
entries.cannot_remove_ring: You cannot remove a unity ring.
